title: Thaavalam
text:
Thaavalam is a <a href="Malayalam%20action%20films%20of%201983">1983</a> <a href="Cinema%20of%20India">Indian</a> <a href="Malayalam%20language">Malayalam</a> film, directed by <a href="Thampi%20Kannanthanam">Thampi Kannanthanam</a> and produced by Koshi Ninan and Philip Maryvilla. The film stars <a href="M.%20G.%20Soman">M. G. Soman</a>, <a href="Mohanlal">Mohanlal</a>, <a href="Jayabharathi">Jayabharathi</a>, <a href="Shubha%20%28actress%29">Shubha</a> and <a href="Menaka%20%28actress%29">Menaka</a> in the lead roles. The film has musical score by <a href="Johnson%20%28composer%29">Johnson</a>.
Soundtrack.
The music was composed by <a href="Johnson%20%28composer%29">Johnson</a> and the lyrics were written by <a href="Poovachal%20Khader">Poovachal Khader</a>.
